alert.note: Alert for Wasatch (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 15 at 11:50AM MDT until further notice by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by recent rain and snowmelt is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of northern Utah, including the following county, Wasatch. * WHEN...Until 745 PM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Flooding in and around the Strawberry River as it enters Strawberry Reservoir. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1150 AM MDT, emergency management reported significant flood inundation is occurring in and around the Strawberry River as it enters Strawberry Reservoir. This inundation is currently hampering access to the Strawberry Reservoir Marina. Daily isolated shower and thunderstorm activity may allow for higher flows if a shower or thunderstorm moves over the drainage. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Strawberry Reservoir.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
